author: jvanzyl
msg: Allow the project resolver to deal with an individual JAR file or a
directory containing JAR and class files.

author: jvanzyl
msg: Modified the project resolver to walk through a base directory looking
for JAR and class files instead of just a single JAR file. I basically
want to make something to unpack a distribution and make a project

author: jvanzyl
msg: Adding javadoc to the project resolver.

author: jvanzyl
msg: Added executor and accompanying changes to create a package -> project
map so that a set of class references can be turned into a set of
project references with the help of bcel which will collect the
class references from a set of JARs or classfiles.
If you want to make run the dist target you need to have the gump
descriptors checked out in order to make a set of maven descriptors.

author: jtaylor
msg: This now takes an xdocs/project.xml and builds a single .fo, loading any
documents specified in the menu. Still a ton to do here. There is a serious
problem with the order in which things get serialized, so that links and other
inline elements are always at the beginning of paragraphs.
To run this I added a target like this to build-docs.xml, but I'm not sure I
understand how that file is organized so I didn't want to commit my changes:
description="o Generate pdf project documentation xdoc sources">
<!-- Need to add the maven jar to load the toolbox -->
